widget.name: WinJS.UI.ToggleSwitch
widget.description: A control that lets the user switch an option on or off.

property.name: checked
property.description: Gets or sets whether the control is on (checked is set to true) or off (checked is set to false).

property.name: disabled
property.description: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control is disabled.

property.name: element
property.description: The DOM element that hosts the ToggleSwitch control.

property.name: labelOn
property.description: Gets or sets the text that displays when the control is on (checked is set to true). The default value is "On".

property.name: labelOff
property.description: Gets or sets the text that displays when the control is off (checked is set to false). The default value is "Off".

property.name: title
property.description: Gets or sets the main text for the ToggleSwitch control. This text is always displayed, regardless of whether the control is switched on or off.

part.name: switch
part.description: The slider that enables the user to switch the state of the ToggleSwitch.

part.name: title
part.description: The main text for the ToggleSwitch control.

part.name: label-on
part.description: The text for when the switch is on.

part.name: label-off
part.description: The text for when the switch is off.
